exposurebracketing: 3 continuous exposures, in 0.3 or 0.7 EV steps
sceneselection: Portrait, Landscape, Macro, Sports, Sunset, Night portrait/Night view
flashmodes: Flash-off, Auto, Fill-flash, Slow sync, Rear Sync., Wireless*, Hi-speed sync.* *With external flash HVL-F58AM, HVL-F56AM, HVL-F42AM, HVL-F36AM
media: Memory Stick PRO Duo / PRO-HG Duo / SD memory card / SDHC memory card
autofocus: TTL phase detection system; CCD line sensors
lcd: 6.7cm (2.7-inch) type, TFT Clear Photo LCD (230,400 dots)
lenscompatibility: Sony α lens, Minolta and Konica Minolta AF lens
creativestylesettings: Standard, Vivid, Portrait, Landscape, Sunset, B/W
builtinflash: Auto pop-up — GN 12 at ISO 100, FOV coverage up to 18mm
imagesensor: APS-C size (23.4×15.6mm) CMOS sensor “Exmor” with RGB primary colour filters
exposuremodes: Programmed AE (AUTO, AUTO – Flash Off, P), Aperture priority, Shutter priority, Manual, Scene selection
focusmodes: AF/MF selectable. AF modes: Single-shot AF, Automatic AF, Continuous AF
antidustsystem: Coating on low pass filter, plus image-sensor shift
whitebalancesettings: Auto / 6 presets / Colour Temperature/Colour Filter /  Custom WB
